insert into t_winner_team (team_name, team_user_list, gmt_create, gmt_modified, the_year, team_begin_time, team_end_time, delete_status, competition_id, team_order_num, team_order_text) values (#{teamName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamUserList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{theYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamBeginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{teamEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, #{competitionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{teamOrderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teamOrderText,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select team_id, team_name, team_user_list, gmt_create, gmt_modified, the_year, team_begin_time, team_end_time, delete_status, competition_id, team_order_num, team_order_text from t_winner_team

SELECT tci.competition_id, tci.competition_name, twt.team_name, twt.team_user_list, nos.year_start_time as team_begin_time, nos.year_end_time as team_end_time, nos.the_year, twt.team_order_num, twt.team_order_text FROM `t_winner_team` AS twt INNER JOIN t_competition_introduction AS tci ON twt.competition_id = tci.competition_id INNER JOIN number_of_sessions AS nos ON nos.year_id = twt.the_year WHERE twt.delete_status = 0 and nos.delete_status = 0 ORDER BY twt.competition_id, STR_TO_DATE( date_format( nos.year_start_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ), '%Y' ) DESC, twt.team_order_num

SELECT * FROM t_register_team WHERE team_name = #{teamName} AND competition_id = #{competitionId} AND STR_TO_DATE( date_format( register_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ), '%Y' )= STR_TO_DATE( date_format(( SELECT year_start_time FROM number_of_sessions WHERE the_year = #{year} ), '%Y-%m-%d' ), '%Y' )
